24  package org.hibernate.test.cache.infinispan.functional.cluster;
25  
26  import javax.transaction.TransactionManager;
27  
28  import org.infinispan.Cache;
29  import org.infinispan.manager.CacheContainer;
30  import org.infinispan.test.TestingUtil;
31  import org.jboss.logging.Logger;
32  import org.junit.Test;
33  
34  import org.hibernate.SessionFactory;
35  import org.hibernate.cache.infinispan.InfinispanRegionFactory;
36  import org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration;
37  import org.hibernate.cfg.Environment;
38  import org.hibernate.test.cache.infinispan.functional.classloader.Account;
39  import org.hibernate.test.cache.infinispan.functional.classloader.ClassLoaderTestDAO;
40  
41  import static org.junit.Assert.assertEquals;
42  import static org.junit.Assert.assertNotNull;
43  
44  /**
45   * SessionRefreshTestCase.
46   *
47   * @author Galder Zamarre√±o
48   * @since 3.5
49   */
50  public class SessionRefreshTestCase extends DualNodeTestCase {
51  	private static final Logger log = Logger.getLogger( SessionRefreshTestCase.class );
52  
53  	static int test = 0;
54  	private Cache localCache;
55  
56  	@Override
57  	protected void configureSecondNode(Configuration cfg) {
58  		super.configureSecondNode( cfg );
59  		cfg.setProperty( Environment.USE_SECOND_LEVEL_CACHE, "false" );
60  	}
61  
62  	@Override
63  	protected void standardConfigure(Configuration cfg) {
64  		super.standardConfigure( cfg );
65  		cfg.setProperty( InfinispanRegionFactory.ENTITY_CACHE_RESOURCE_PROP, getEntityCacheConfigName() );
66  	}
67  
68  	protected String getEntityCacheConfigName() {
69  		return "entity";
70  	}
71  
72  	@Override
73  	public String[] getMappings() {
74  		return new String[] {"cache/infinispan/functional/classloader/Account.hbm.xml"};
75  	}
76  
77  	@Override
78  	protected void cleanupTransactionManagement() {
79  		// Don't clean up the managers, just the transactions
80  		// Managers are still needed by the long-lived caches
81  		DualNodeJtaTransactionManagerImpl.cleanupTransactions();
82  	}
83  
84  	@Test
85  	public void testRefreshAfterExternalChange() throws Exception {
86  		// First session factory uses a cache
87  		CacheContainer localManager = ClusterAwareRegionFactory.getCacheManager( DualNodeTestCase.LOCAL );
88  		localCache = localManager.getCache( Account.class.getName() );
89  		TransactionManager localTM = DualNodeJtaTransactionManagerImpl.getInstance( DualNodeTestCase.LOCAL );
90  		SessionFactory localFactory = sessionFactory();
91  
92  		// Second session factory doesn't; just needs a transaction manager
93  		TransactionManager remoteTM = DualNodeJtaTransactionManagerImpl.getInstance( DualNodeTestCase.REMOTE );
94  		SessionFactory remoteFactory = secondNodeEnvironment().getSessionFactory();
95  
96  		ClassLoaderTestDAO dao0 = new ClassLoaderTestDAO( localFactory, localTM );
97  		ClassLoaderTestDAO dao1 = new ClassLoaderTestDAO( remoteFactory, remoteTM );
98  
99  		Integer id = new Integer( 1 );
100 		dao0.createAccount( dao0.getSmith(), id, new Integer( 5 ), DualNodeTestCase.LOCAL );
101 
102 		// Basic sanity check
103 		Account acct1 = dao1.getAccount( id );
104 		assertNotNull( acct1 );
105 		assertEquals( DualNodeTestCase.LOCAL, acct1.getBranch() );
106 
107 		// This dao's session factory isn't caching, so cache won't see this change
108 		dao1.updateAccountBranch( id, DualNodeTestCase.REMOTE );
109 
110 		// dao1's session doesn't touch the cache,
111 		// so reading from dao0 should show a stale value from the cache
112 		// (we check to confirm the cache is used)
113 		Account acct0 = dao0.getAccount( id );
114 		assertNotNull( acct0 );
115 		assertEquals( DualNodeTestCase.LOCAL, acct0.getBranch() );
116 		log.debug( "Contents when re-reading from local: " + TestingUtil.printCache( localCache ) );
117 
118 		// Now call session.refresh and confirm we get the correct value
119 		acct0 = dao0.getAccountWithRefresh( id );
120 		assertNotNull( acct0 );
121 		assertEquals( DualNodeTestCase.REMOTE, acct0.getBranch() );
122 		log.debug( "Contents after refreshing in remote: " + TestingUtil.printCache( localCache ) );
123 
124 		// Double check with a brand new session, in case the other session
125 		// for some reason bypassed the 2nd level cache
126 		ClassLoaderTestDAO dao0A = new ClassLoaderTestDAO( localFactory, localTM );
127 		Account acct0A = dao0A.getAccount( id );
128 		assertNotNull( acct0A );
129 		assertEquals( DualNodeTestCase.REMOTE, acct0A.getBranch() );
130 		log.debug( "Contents after creating a new session: " + TestingUtil.printCache( localCache ) );
131 	}
132 }
